subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Unicode Status
msgSnippet: ... That’s not weird. That’s only natural since Shavian and Quikscript are two separate scripts. That unification is completely artificial. ... Couldn’t
messageBody:
Le 16/04/13 14:32, Michael Everson a écrit :
> The fact that there are two different sort orders for Shavian and Quikscript is kind of weird.

That’s not weird. That’s only natural since Shavian and Quikscript are
two separate scripts. That unification is completely artificial.

> But I have to recommend where to interleave the new characters in the Shavian based ordering.

Couldn’t you propose a new order for Quikscript? Different alphabets,
different collation rules.
